statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_and_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Passed';
SELECT inspection_type, COUNT(*) AS inspection_count FROM compliance_and_inspections GROUP BY inspection_type;
SELECT * FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspector_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_type, inspection_result FROM compliance_and_inspections ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name FROM compliance_and_inspections ORDER BY inspector_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_type, inspection_notes FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_type LIKE '%Safety%' AND inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE passed_inspection = TRUE
SELECT vehicle_id, last_inspection_date, next_inspection_date FROM compliance_data ORDER BY last_inspection_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, last_inspection_date, passed_inspection FROM compliance_data WHERE last_inspection_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inspection_records WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, last_inspection_date FROM compliance_data WHERE passed_inspection = true;
SELECT vehicle_id, next_inspection_date, passed_inspection FROM compliance_data WHERE last_inspection_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM inspection_records WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_inspection_date, next_inspection_date FROM compliance_data WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM safety_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM transportation_vehicles WHERE production_year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_id, inspection_date, safety_report FROM safety_inspections;
SELECT * FROM safety_inspections WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer FROM transportation_vehicles WHERE production_year > 2015;
SELECT inspection_id, safety_report FROM safety_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance rc JOIN safety_inspections si ON rc.vehicle_id = si.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT serial_number, manufacturing_date FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, regulation_id, compliance_date FROM compliance ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, manufacturing_date FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT inspections.inspection_id, inspections.inspection_date, vehicles.vehicle_type FROM inspections INNER JOIN vehicles ON inspections.vehicle_id = vehicles.id WHERE inspections.result = 'Pass';
SELECT regulations.regulation_name, compliance.compliance_date FROM regulations INNER JOIN compliance ON regulations.regulation_id = compliance.regulation_id ORDER BY compliance.compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Car', 'Truck') AND manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year >= 2010;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, violation_description FROM violations WHERE fine_amount > 500.00;
SELECT * FROM inspection_details WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date >= '2021-01-01' AND inspection_result = 'Pass'
SELECT id, inspector_name from inspections ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, violation_description FROM violations WHERE fine_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM inspection_details WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending' LIMIT 5
